price: 100. Itulah beberapa cerita tentang negeri-negeri (yang telah dibinasakan) yang Kami ceritakan kepadamu (Muhammad). Di antara negeri-negeri itu sebagian masih ada bekas-bekasnya dan ada (pula) yang telah musnah.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيۡكَۖ مِنۡهَا قَآئِمٞ وَحَصِيدٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-qurā naquṣṣuhu ʿalayka min'hā qāimun waḥaṣīdun
